00035 namespace base {

00037 
00038 class VectorImpl : public base::ReferencedObject
00039 {
00040 
00041 public:
00042   VectorImpl(Int d = 1, Real v = Real(0)) :d(d) {}
00043   VectorImpl(const VectorImpl& v) :d(v.d) {}
00044   explicit VectorImpl(Real array[], Int d) : d(d) {}
00045   ~VectorImpl() {}
00046 
00047   virtual void setZero() throw() = 0;
00048 
00049   Int dim() const throw() { return d; }
00050 
00051   // Only supported by some Implementations
00052   virtual void resize(Int d)            throw(std::runtime_error)
00053     { throw std::runtime_error(Exception("not supported by this Vector implemenation")); }
00054   virtual void destructiveResize(Int d) throw(std::runtime_error)
00055     { throw std::runtime_error(Exception("not supported by this Vector implemenation")); }
00056   virtual void swap(VectorImpl& v)      throw(std::runtime_error)
00057     { throw std::runtime_error(Exception("not supported by this Vector implemenation")); }
00058 
00059   virtual Real& e(Int i) throw() = 0;
00060   virtual Real  e(Int i) const throw() = 0;
00061 
00062   virtual VectorImpl& operator=(const VectorImpl& src) throw() = 0;
00063   virtual VectorImpl& operator=(Real src) throw() = 0;
00064 
00065   virtual bool operator==(const VectorImpl& v) const throw();
00066   virtual bool equals(const VectorImpl& v, Real epsilon = base::epsilon) const throw();
00067 
00068   virtual VectorImpl& negate() throw();
00069 
00070   // operators/operations
00071   virtual Real dot(const VectorImpl& v2) const throw();
00072   virtual VectorImpl& operator+=(const VectorImpl& v2) throw();
00073   virtual VectorImpl& operator-=(const VectorImpl& v2) throw();
00074   virtual VectorImpl& operator*=(Real s) throw();
00075   virtual VectorImpl& operator/=(Real s) throw();
00076 
00077   // Only supported by some Implementations
00078   virtual Real* c_array() throw(std::runtime_error) 
00079     { throw std::runtime_error(Exception("not supported by this Vector implemenation")); }
00080 
00081   virtual std::valarray<Real>& valarray() throw(std::runtime_error)
00082     { throw std::runtime_error(Exception("not supported by this Vector implemenation")); }
00083 
00084

00086   Int d;      // dimension
00087 
00088 };

00091 // default implementations
00092 
00093 inline bool VectorImpl::operator==(const VectorImpl& v) const throw()
00094 {
00095   for(Int i=1; i<=dim(); i++)
00096     if (e(i) != v.e(i)) 
00097       return false;
00098   return true;
00099 }
00100 
00101 inline bool VectorImpl::equals(const VectorImpl& v, Real epsilon) const throw()
00102 {
00103   for(Int i=1; i<=v.dim(); i++)
00104     if (!base::equals(e(i),v.e(i),epsilon))
00105       return false;
00106   return true;
00107 }
00108 
00109 
00110 inline VectorImpl& VectorImpl::negate() throw()
00111 {
00112   for(Int i=1; i<=dim(); i++)
00113     e(i) = i-e(i);
00114   return *this;
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 inline Real VectorImpl::dot(const VectorImpl& v2) const throw()
00119 {
00120   Real sum=0;
00121   for(Int i=1; i<=dim(); i++)
00122     sum += ( e(i) * v2.e(i) );
00123   return sum;
00124 }
00125 
00126 inline VectorImpl& VectorImpl::operator+=(const VectorImpl& v2) throw()
00127 {
00128   for(Int i=1; i<=dim(); i++)
00129     e(i) += v2.e(i);
00130   return *this;
00131 }
00132 
00133 inline VectorImpl& VectorImpl::operator-=(const VectorImpl& v2) throw()
00134 {
00135   for(Int i=1; i<=dim(); i++)
00136     e(i) -= v2.e(i);
00137   return *this;
00138 }
00139 
00140 inline VectorImpl& VectorImpl::operator*=(Real s) throw()
00141 {
00142   for(Int i=1; i<=dim(); i++)
00143     e(i) *= s;
00144   return *this;
00145 }
00146 
00147 inline VectorImpl& VectorImpl::operator/=(Real s) throw()
00148 {
00149   for(Int i=1; i<=dim(); i++)
00150     e(i) /= s;
00151   return *this;
00152 }
